description: A simple and useful app to track the market
Needs to be sandboxed
simple and easy

A perfect app for simple price checking on various tickers. Lots of indices available, as well. 

Thanks bitstower!
Nice work!

- I expected to be able to add values to a portfolio
 - by (amount, absolute value)
 - by (amount, buy date)
- I expected a monthly, yearly and 5 year overview
 - per value
 - for the whole portfolio
- I expected a one liner to short summary view per value (to list more)
It gives you the Market in a much more essential way.
Does what it says. Quick overview of any publicly traded stock.
Simple and elegant. Exactly what I was looking for.

Fix required: Dark mode only works for the adwaita-dark theme, I cant use any other theme or it will still be light, not just dark mode the window titlebr isn't the system theme if I didn't put the default ne.

review: Good App, simple, clean and fits well with the GNOME dekstop
For an app that says "track your investments" it doesn't really do that. You can't add in your portfolio holdings, purchase price / date, etc. It just shows share prices.
please 8) otherwise great, also it would be awesome if a simple 5yr chart could be loaded within the app

The app works great, reminds me of the iPhone stock app, but simpler.
There's only one think that I think can really need some improvement, on the light theme there's not enough contrast on the green color, on the dark theme the red color is also hard to read.
summary: Works well, needs better color contrast

description:
The app is OK.
But since the new installation the dark theme does not work anymore!
Some of the info, hardly can be read for some people.
Fedora 34.. Dark Theme doesn't work
This app no longer works. Price update stopped as of May 2023

Versions in Fedora RPM and Flatpak repositories are 1 year old and no longer allow user to get any quotes. Possibly a dependency on some third party service that is no longer around. Github repository was archived [frozen] on 2023-03-03 without any reason given. Home page linked to from app no longer exists. Code base was updated shortly before being archived and that's more recent than this repository. I was unable to compile the project from the git instructions without hitting a lot of roadblocks but you may have more luck. If you can get quotes, it's an easy to use and useful app that deserves 5 stars. However marking as 1 star as the current Flathub and RPM versions are sadly literally unusable by anyone.
summary: Abandoned Project - No Longer Updates Any Quotes

description: For the short time that I had this app working it was nice but it seems that since they offered the added feature of a dark theme it no longer works. I've left the app installed but since no updated to get the app working has been made available for a while now, I'll be uninstalling. Until there is a new update, I wouldn't suggest you waste your time installing this app.
summary: No longer works and hasn't been updated or repaired

description:
It doesn't pull any data at all.
I tried a few things including uninstalling and reinstalling it a couple times, all to no avail.
App perpetually shows "market closed" for all positions
Broken as of March 2024 with showing zeroes for all markets
summary: Doesn't load any market data - Just all 0.00's

description: Broken as of April 25, 2024. It just shows zeros for all markets. But UI looks lice
summary: Does not work as of April 2024

description:
Ein Wrapper um Yahoo! Finance. Zeigt für ein Portfolio die aktuellen Kurse an. Sonst keinerlei Funktion … man kann das übersichtlich finden, aber eigentlich hat von so wenig Information vermutlich kaum jemand einen Nutzen?
Leider kann es weder mit ISIN noch WKN umgehen, vor allem für nicht-amerikanische Nutzer:innen daher etwas umständlich. Und für alle weitergehenden Infos wird man eh auf finance.yahoo.com weitergeleitet. Da kann man auch gleich die Website (oder sonst eine) aufmachen.
Works like it should, easy and fast overview.
Would be great if the prices can update automatically
The best app I've tried
